options.tiefix.title: TieFix Settings
options.tiefix.mc2071: Allow opening GUIs in a nether portal
options.tiefix.mc89242: Fix line limit when writing sign
options.tiefix.mc122477.explanation: When a key press is received immediately after opening the chat, it will be ignored only if it is found in "Keys to ignore". If the box is empty, then all characters will be ignored. If you find that the chat prompt is sometimes ignoring your first key press, then set it to your inventory, chat, and command keybinds (for example, "et/"), and any modded keybinds that may immediately focus a text box. If unsure, leave it blank.
options.tiefix.mc127970: Fix offhand item while using riptide
options.tiefix.mc140646: Scroll text fields while selecting text
options.tiefix.mc147766: Fix stuck Shift key in text boxes
